subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tracy McGrady scored 19 points in less than three quarters and the Houston Rockets routed the cold-shooting Nets, 91-73, on Monday night to win their 19th game in a row.
snippet: Tracy McGrady scored 19 points in less than three quarters and the Houston Rockets routed the cold-shooting Nets, 91-73, on Monday night to win their 19th game in a row.
